title: HOUR 1 - Harden, Mavericks, Hopkins
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Harden, Mavericks, Hopkins
description:
Sixers G James Harden is no longer a number 1

The Mavericks need another star player

Cardinals WR DeAndre Hopkins will miss the first 6 games of the season


Guest: Nick Wright
